title: The Amazing Crystal
description: In the summer of 2025, Lydia's grandfather sent her a strange diamond pendant admonishing her to handle it with the utmost care. From the moment she receives the small package, her life changes. She becomes engulfed in a series of life-threatening events that lead er to realize the incredible properties of the pendant. Slowly she learns that the diamond contains an alien intelligence able to communicate directly with the human brain. Rumors of its power spread, the Mafia designs a Machiavellian plot to seize the extraterrestrial gem, whose value is estimated at $100 billion. An unprecedented confrontation occurs between mercenaries hired by the Mafia and American security services. As rumors continue to grow, the American authorities are forced to release stunning revelations about the life and mission of the alien genius to the peoples and nations of the world. The news throws the scientific world into turmoil. Economic and political ideologies are brought into question and religious beliefs are shaken. But the Mafia wants to have the last say: confrontation is inevitable.
author: Gerald Lizee
